title: AI Assistant for Productivity & Wellbeing
description: A cross-platform app that acts as a self-improving AI productivity assistant, using voice interaction and customizable workflows via tools like LangChain or n8n.

title: Student Notes Sharing Platform
description: A web app where students can upload and access class notes easily, helping improve access to study resources in real-time.

title: Shoe Price Tracker
description: An app that tracks shoe prices across JD Sports, Sportchek, and other stores, stores historical price data, and alerts users on price drops.

title: Reddit TikTok/YouTube Story Bot
description: Automation tool that turns Reddit threads into short video content for YouTube Shorts and TikTok with voiceovers and subtitles.

title: Football-Themed Portfolio Site
description: A creative, EA FC-inspired portfolio showcasing your work and personality using football visual design.
